thread.section_title: StorageMart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of StorageMart | storage-mart.com
thread.title: Gary Nimis

author: Gary Nimis
title: Gary Nimis
text:
I was welcomed to the location and a friendly attendant showed me the available storage units so I could choose the one that worked best for my needs.
I decided and we completed the paperwork and I received all the information I needed to access the unit at my convenience.
I left and then weeks later, when I was ready, I moved my belongings into my storage unit after regular business hours.
I had chosen an indoor unit and when I entered the lights were all on motion sensors and came on as I needed them and only the ones that I needed.
I put my belongings into the unit, locked everything up and left. There was no hassle or inconvenience and I am very satisfied with the unit and the staff.
